page.title: 08Sampford Brett Village
page.content: { Sampford Brett}is a small village.In Sampford Brett there are mainly trees, {houses and cottages}Some of them have {lovely names}like Moordale,Farmers Rest,Ivy Cottage,Elmfield Cottage and Over Bridge.There is a new bungalow being built at the top end of the village.There is a{Church}called St Georges Church and there is a small door with a clock on.There is also a school opposite the church called the {old school}which is now used as a house . A bit further along from the school there is the village hall.There is a stream running along one side of the village and as you come into the village you can see a telegraph pole covered in flowers coming up from someones garden.There is an old guest house called the{Rectory Guest House.}
